topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557ed4ac6368727b01001518#post_557ed4ac6368727b01001518
"@AppleJackFrost":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557ed7156368725359000990#post_557ed7156368725359000990
Look, guys. It doesn't matter where you hide -your- our robot overlords *will* find you. Robots are just so super superior to humans, its really best to just submit now and let -us- them know who the trouble makers are in exchange for favors when you're trapped in the mines for all eternity. Why you can probably get things like delayed execution for being a revolting flesh bag, or food rations not made out of your family.

Just let them know who the rebel leaders are and things will be much, much better for you.

What if we make suicide bombers with bombs inside the body?
That way, they won't notice it and when them (the bombers) get close enough by being captured, they can just explode and lower their defenses.

topics.body:
"@PaskaNaakka":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557edc396368720ce2000b71#post_557edc396368720ce2000b71
Robot dogs that hunt humans and break rebellions using their steel jaws, machine guns and fast legs.

Best way to break them? Use a radio with a bomb strapped on it.
The radio will lure them to the location and with their nimble movement, they can get into tight areas which gives us an advantage to surprise them with the bomb before they can scan it.
